parameters.slogan: "Your connection for DATA and TECH jobs"
parameters.author: Todd Nevins and Ron Emery
parameters.name: icrunchdata

bdy.p: icrunchdata is an Employment website specializing in the Technology and Data jobs niche. icrunchdata also features social networking for job seekers and employers. The site has over 65,000 users and a market reach of over 2.5 million job seekers per month.1

sec.p:
The company was co-founded by Ron Emery and Todd Nevins in 2003 and features job postings from direct hire employers, staffing firms, and advertising agencies. icrunchdata is located in
Plano, Texas
.

icrunchdata Employers can post jobs and search resumes. Job Seekers can post a resume and profile, upload photos, connect to friends, get endorsements and apply to job postings in several industry categories such as data analysis jobs, information technology jobs, business intelligence jobs, data warehouse jobs, database administration jobs, statistics jobs, analytical jobs, database marketing jobs, and all other related database jobs.
icrunchdata is also partnered with www.Statistics.com and www.SAS.com.2

icrunchdata also hosts the
SAS System
job network and hosts information on resume and job tips.

In March 2008, SAS and icrunchdata partnered to create the SAS Job Network in order to "link the demand for analytical talent and SAS skills with the supply. Graduates with analytical skills, especially at the entry level, are increasingly needed as companies invest in technology to analyze growing stores of data to make better business decisions."2

reflist.entry: ( March 12 2008). " SAS and icrunchdata connect employers with SAS talent". Press release. Retrieved on 2008-06-22.

list.entry: Karen Nielsen. " Two Minutes with Todd Nevins", Dallas Business Journal, May 9 2008.
